ApiGatewayName.Description: The name of the API Gateway resource

DynamoDBTableName.Description: The name of the DynamoDB table resource

LambdaFunctionName.Description: The name of the Lambda function

LambdaHandler.Description: The handler for the Lambda function

LambdaRuntime.Description: The runtime for the Lambda function

LambdaCodeS3Bucket.Description: The S3 bucket where the Lambda function code is stored

LambdaCodeS3Key.Description: The S3 key for the Lambda function code
